title: Helped Boost Ties: PM In Letter To Tarique Rahman After Khaleda Zia's Death
content: PM Modi's letter was delivered today by foreign minister S Jaishankar, who represented India at the funeral of Khaleda Zia.

title: S Jaishankar Meets Tarique Rahman, Pak Speaker At Khaleda Zia's Funeral
content: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar, who represented India at the funeral of Bangladesh's former Prime Minister Khaleda Zia, met her son and Bangladesh Nationalist Party leader Tarique Rahman and handed him a letter of condolence from PM Modi.

title: Fireworks, Celebrations: Several Countries Ring In 2026. This Was The First
content: As the world prepares to turn the calendar page, New Zealand, Australia, South Korea, North Korea and Japan have already welcomed the New Year.

title: At PRAGATI Meet,  PM's 'Reform, Perform And Transform' Mantra
content: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Wednesday stressed on the mantra of reform, perform and transform at the 50th meeting of PRAGATI, which accelerated projects worth more than Rs 85 lakh crore over the past decade.

title: 2012 Pune Serial Blasts Accused Shot Dead In Maharashtra
content: Bunty Jahagirdar, one of the accused in the 2012 Pune serial blasts case, was allegedly shot dead by unidentified assailants in Shrirampur town in Ahilyanagar district on Wednesday, police said.

title: Nandini Chakravorty Appointed West Bengal's First Woman Chief Secretary
content: Nandini Chakravorty was appointed on Wednesday as the chief secretary of West Bengal, becoming the first woman to hold the post in the state, a senior official said.

title: Op Sindoor "Resounding Testament" To Resolve Against Terrorism: Government
content: Operation Sindoor stands as a "resounding testament" to India's unwavering resolve against terrorism, the defence ministry said.

title: Blog: In Manipur, The More Things Change, The More They Stay The Same
content: Thousands of people in Manipur will spend a third New Year in relief camps. A few of them have returned to villages in the foothills where the district borders meet. With hours to go before the world enters 2026, we see where things stand today.

title: 'Worrying Trend': Pinarayi Vijayan, Congress Slam Pastor's Arrest In Maharashtra
content: A pastor from Kerala and seven others were arrested on charges of offering money to people for conversion to Christianity in Maharashtra's Amravati district today.

title: Gulmarg Happy On New Year's Eve As Tourists Flock In, Snow Makes A Return
content: Thousands of tourists have flocked to Gulmarg, Kashmir's winter wonderland, to welcome the New Year with traditional music and dance.

title: Government Keeps Small Savings Rates Unchanged For 7th Straight Quarter
content: The government on Wednesday left interest rates unchanged for various small savings schemes, including PPF and NSC, for the seventh straight quarter, beginning January 1, 2026.

title: Ensure Proper Treatment: Mohan Yadav To Doctors After Indor Water Tragedy
content: Madhya Pradesh Chief Minister Mohan Yadav visited Indore on Wednesday evening and met people hospitalised after falling ill due to consumption of contaminated drinking water, officials said.

title: Students Protest At Jantar Mantar Over Tripura Man's Death In Dehradun
content: Students from the Northeast on Wednesday staged a protest at the Jantar Mantar here demanding justice for Tripura student Anjel Chakma, who died of a stab injury in Dehradun recently.

title: Faridabad Gang-Rape Horror: Van Caught On CCTV, Survivor In Trauma
content: CCTV visuals have emerged showing the van in which a 28-year-old Faridabad woman was gang-raped on Tuesday for over two hours before being thrown on the road.

title: Russia Releases Video Of Drone It Claims Was Used To Attack Putin's Home
content: Russia had alleged that Ukraine carried out a drone attack on Russian President Vladimir Putin's residence in the Novgorod region, although they did not say where he was at the time.

title: Lok Sabha, Rajya Sabha Spent Less Than 30% Of Time On Legislation In 2025
content: The Lok Sabha and the Rajya Sabha spent less than 30 per cent of their time this year on legislative business, including discussing and passing bills, a legislative think tank has said.

title: Cabinet Clears Rs 19,142-Crore Corridor Connecting Nashik-Solapur-Akkalkot
content: The Union Cabinet on Wednesday approved the construction of a six-lane greenfield access-controlled Nashik-Solapur-Akkalkot corridor in Maharashtra with a total capital cost of Rs 19,142 crore.

title: 1992-Batch IPS Officer Ajay Singhal Appointed Haryana Top Cop
content: Senior IPS officer Ajay Singhal was appointed the new director general of police of Haryana on Wednesday, an official order said. A 1992-batch IPS officer, Singhal replaces O P Singh, who retired from service on Wednesday.

title: From Fog To Filth: Delhi Records 3rd-Worst December AQI In A Decade
content: Delhi is battling a dangerous mix of dense fog and severe pollution, pushing the Air Quality Index (AQI) close to 400, a level classified as 'severe.'

title: Happy New Year 2026: 30+ Wishes, images, greetings, quotes and more
content: As 2026 approaches, the article highlights the diverse ways people celebrate and express New Year's wishes. It emphasizes the value of simple, heartfelt messages, relatable quotes, and genuine status updates, alongside visual elements like images and wallpapers, to connect with loved ones during this transitional period.

title: Rewind 2025: When Tesla's ex-AI director gave 'word' that changed work of software engineers
content: Andrej Karpathy coined "Vibe Coding" to describe AI-assisted programming, where developers rely on natural language prompts. This concept, recognized by Collins Dictionary as Word of the Year, sparks debate about its impact on traditional coding skills and job security in the tech industry.

title: Goa nightclub fire: Illegal salt pan structure, collusion with officials; what probe report revealed
content: A magisterial inquiry found a Goa nightclub, where 25 died in a fire, was illegally built on a salt pan and operated without valid permissions. Systemic failures and alleged collusion by local authorities were highlighted, as the village panchayat issued a license despite it not being renewed, allowing the club to continue functioning.

title: 'New normal': How India's 2025 'zero-tolerance' doctrine pushed terror outfits and Pakistan to the sidelines
content: India's national security adopted a harder stance in 2025 following the brutal Pahalgam massacre. Prime Minister Modi declared a 'Yuddha' against terror, leading to Operation Sindoor, a significant counteroffensive targeting terror infrastructure deep inside Pakistan and PoK. Diplomatic and military actions were taken to hold Pakistan accountable for cross-border terrorism.

title: Neuralink and parenting: Meta AI chief Alexandr Wang on kids; will wait until Neuralink advances
content: Meta's AI head, Alexandr Wang, revealed he will delay having children until advanced brain-computer interface (BCI) technology like Neuralink is widely available. Wang believes children's early neuroplasticity offers a prime window for intuitive BCI integration, potentially enabling future generations to learn and utilize superintelligence tools more effectively than adults.

title: Spreading 'falsehood' against Modi govt: Nadda hits out at Kharge
content: BJP chief J.P. Nadda accused Congress president Mallikarjun Kharge of spreading falsehoods against the Modi government. Nadda refuted Kharge's allegations on MGNREGA, economy, and environmental issues, stating the people have rejected Congress's lies in multiple elections. He urged Kharge to introspect instead of spreading misinformation.

title: VHT: Sarfaraz Khan slams 75-ball 157; Mumbai post 444, beat Goa by 87 runs
content: Sarfaraz, who was also among the runs in the Syed Mushtaq Ali Trophy, brought up a century off 56 balls, his third hundred in List A cricket. Mumbai piled up 444 for 8 and then limited Goa to 357 for 9.

title: From memes to movements: How 2025 became the year of political awakening for Gen Z
content: What began as side-eyeing governments for being ‚Äúpompous in power‚Äù escalated into calling them out, loudly and publicly. From campus corridors to capital streets, the Gen Z, largely mistaken as the ‚Äúnonchalants,‚Äù made it clear they were no longer willing to cope, stay low-key, or wait their turn. Across countries, young people discovered that turning up in person still mattered. That streets were not obsolete.

title: Aadhaar‚ÄìPAN linking deadline ends today: How to link, penalty and other details
content: Linking your PAN card with Aadhaar is crucial to avoid penalties. The Income Tax department's portal guides you through a simple online process involving your PAN and Aadhaar numbers, followed by an OTP verification. Failure to link by December 31, 2025, will render your PAN inoperative, impacting tax refunds and leading to higher tax deductions and collections.

title: Cong slams arrest of Nagpur Christian priest; demands action against Bajrang Dal
content: Congress has slammed the BJP following the arrest of a Christian priest and 11 others in Nagpur during a prayer meeting, accusing the party of religious bigotry.  MP KC Venugopal and Kerala LoP VD Satheesan condemned the arrests, demanding the FIR be withdrawn and calling for action against Bajrang Dal activists. They highlighted concerns over minority rights and constitutional freedoms.

title: CeeDee Lamb‚Äôs luxury car collection spotlight after Week 17 loss
content: Dallas Cowboys star CeeDee Lamb has a taste for luxury cars and owns quite a few stunners, including a customised Lamborghini Urus

title: Head hopes to revive Ashes drinks tradition with Eng; why it broke down in 2023
content: Australian opener Travis Head expressed his hope for a return to the tradition of post-Ashes drinks between England and Australia.  He believes mutual respect exists despite past tensions, particularly after the Jonny Bairstow stumping incident in the 2023 series. Head looks forward to sharing a beer, highlighting the positive relationships between players on both sides.

title: Zack & Dominique Wheeler‚Äôs 2025 net worth: Earnings, family & more
content: Zack Wheeler's net worth in 2025 is around 70 million dollars. This wealth stems mainly from his Major League Baseball contracts.  His wife, Dominique Wheeler, keeps her finances private.  Their combined net worth highlights how elite MLB deals shape family incomes in the modern era.  Wheeler's recent contract extension with the Phillies significantly boosted his financial standing.

title: Max Scherzer & Erica May-Scherzer‚Äôs 2025 net worth: Inside $180m empire
content: Max Scherzer, the formidable MLB pitcher, has amassed a $180 million net worth by 2025, a testament to his on-field dominance and shrewd financial planning. His career earnings are bolstered by strategic contracts and selective endorsements. Wife Erica May-Scherzer, a former player, significantly contributes to their philanthropic endeavors and family's financial stability.

title: MLB trade rumours: Tigers cautiously eye Bregman as Pirates push for Okamoto
content: Alex Bregman remains unsigned as the Detroit Tigers show only mild interest, according to local reports. The All-Star third baseman is still seeking a long-term deal. Meanwhile, Japanese infielder Kazuma Okamoto is gaining fast attention, with the San Diego Padres, Pittsburgh Pirates, and Los Angeles Angels pushing to sign him before his posting deadline.

title: Lamar Jackson injury update: Will Ravens QB play Week 18 vs Steelers?
content: Lamar Jackson's availability for the crucial Week 18 clash against the Steelers is uncertain due to a painful back injury. While optimism is growing with potential midweek practice, the Ravens are prioritizing his long-term health. His return would significantly boost Baltimore's offense and complicate Pittsburgh's defensive strategy.

title: Karbi Anglong violence: Assam oppn seeks rehabilitation of victims; demads judicial probe
content: Opposition parties in Assam have urged the governor for rehabilitation and compensation for families impacted by recent West Karbi Anglong violence. They demand upholding tribal land rights and fair treatment for all affected communities. The memorandum also calls for a judicial probe into the alleged destruction of evidence at the chief executive member's residence.

title: ‚ÄòSecond fiddle‚Äô fantasy? Sorry, Beijing - US and India won't settle for silver
content: A new narrative suggests China will lead, with the US and India vying for second. Analyst Keji Mao argues US "strategic altruism" towards India has ended due to American decline anxiety. However, the article counters that US decline is exaggerated, China's economic rise faces headwinds, and India is forging an independent path, leading to a complex, contested global order.

title: BJP shares video of brutal assault on woman in West Bengal; slams CM Mamata
content: BJP shared a video showing a woman and her family being brutally attacked with bamboo sticks in Uttar Bhangnamari village, Basanti block, South 24 Parganas, West Bengal. The main accused named are Jalil Laskar, Munna Laskar, and Arif Laskar. BJP leaders, including Amit Malviya, criticized the state government, claiming the attack reflects a failure of law and order and a lack of safety for women in West Bengal.

title: VHT: Pant fails ahead of NZ ODI series selection; Odisha hand Delhi 1st defeat
content: Delhi‚Äôs campaign this season has largely depended on one strong batting effort in each game. The absence of such a performance on Wednesday not only cost them the match but also their position at the top of the points table, a setback that could affect them later in the tournament.

title: Explained: Who is Alaa Abd el-Fattah, and why is his return to the UK making headlines
content: Alaa Abd el-Fattah, once a symbol of Arab Spring idealism, now faces controversy in the UK after his release from Egyptian prison. His return ignited debate over old social media posts and the vetting process for his British citizenship. This episode highlights the complex challenges liberal democracies face when balancing humanitarian advocacy with national security.

title: India‚ÄìUS ties: Embassy shares key moments of 2025; eyes stronger year ahead
content: The US Embassy in India celebrated a year of robust bilateral ties, highlighting key moments like Prime Minister Modi's meeting with President Trump and the signing of a major defense pact.  Discussions also covered space collaboration and leadership exchanges, underscoring a commitment to strengthening the partnership despite global challenges. Both nations look forward to continued cooperation.

title: Trump's return, PM Modi's carpool & Pikachu: Images that defined world politics in 2025
content: 2025 was dominated by Donald Trump's return to the White House, with striking photographs capturing his inauguration and key diplomatic encounters. The year also saw significant moments like Trudeau's resignation, hostage releases, protests in Nepal, and strategic alliances forming between global leaders.

title: TOI Habit Index: India‚Äôs 2025 entertainment split - Netflix nights, reel breaks
content: India's screen time is dominated by OTT content, with Netflix leading viewership. Short-form videos like reels also capture significant attention, driven by a desire for relaxation and entertainment. Viewers are increasingly aware of digital fatigue, aiming to reduce aimless scrolling and screen time.

title: Bengal polls 2026: Shah sets ground rules for BJP cadre; pushes grassroots drive
content: Union Home Minister Amit Shah has urged BJP representatives in West Bengal to intensify grassroots outreach, dedicating at least four days weekly to constituencies and holding daily street-corner meetings. He emphasized performance for ticket consideration and signaled a renewed role for former state chief Dilip Ghosh in the upcoming assembly elections.

title: Set to be NYC mayor: Zohran Mamdani to assume office on New Year‚Äôs Da
content: Zohran Mamdani will be sworn in as New York City's new mayor on New Year's Day with two ceremonies. The first, a private family oath at the historic City Hall subway station, will be administered by Attorney General Letitia James. A public celebration with a second oath on the steps of City Hall, led by Senator Bernie Sanders, will follow.

title: India‚Äôs ODI squad vs NZ: Gill to lead; Bumrah and Pandya likely to be rested
content: The Indian squad for the upcoming ODI series against New Zealand will be selected on January 3. The series begins on January 11 in Vadodara. Virat Kohli and Rohit Sharma are set to feature. Shubman Gill will lead the team. Hardik Pandya and Jasprit Bumrah may be rested for workload management. Dhruv Jurel is a potential wicketkeeper choice.

title: Why Sensex, Nifty underperformed in 2025 & where are they headed in 2026? Top points
content: Indian equities lagged global markets in 2025 due to muted corporate earnings, FII selling, and missed AI rally. Despite touching record highs, broader market sentiment remained subdued. Experts anticipate a stronger 2026, driven by domestic growth, potential FII return, and improved valuations, with Nifty and Sensex targets set higher.

title: From Coldplay to AQI and Dhurandhar ‚Äî What India talked about in 2025
content: 2025 was a year of extremes for India, marked by the spiritual grandeur of the Maha Kumbh, a tragic stampede, and Bollywood actor Saif Ali Khan's stabbing. The year also saw significant policy shifts like zero income tax up to Rs 12 lakh and a strong counter-terror response with Operation Sindoor following the Pahalgam attack.

title: Ayesha Curry‚Äôs 'A+ wife move' for Stephen Curry goes viral online
content: Ayesha Curry recently garnered widespread praise from fans for wearing her husband Stephen Curry's Davidson jersey during a visit to his alma mater. This heartwarming gesture, seen during a tribute to the NBA star, effectively silenced recent marriage rumors. Fans lauded her unwavering support and loyalty, highlighting the couple's strong bond.

title: Jagannath temple pulls 2026 calendars: Image shows deities in incorrect positions; triggers backlash
content: The Jagannath temple administration in Puri has apologized and halted the sale of 2026 calendars after depicting the sibling deities in incorrect positions on the Ratna Singhasan. The administration attributed the error to a century-old manuscript, stating there was no intent to offend religious sentiments. Political parties criticized the inaccuracies, which also extended to the depiction of Rath Yatra chariots

title: US-based Doctor‚Äôs eye-opening post flags unsettling health reality of 2025
content: The year 2025 revealed health dangers beyond viruses. Extreme longevity proved detrimental. Air pollution impacted lungs and health year-round. Mental burnout caused physical harm. Isolation posed risks similar to smoking. Fitness obsessions led to injuries. Heat waves became deadly. Sleep debt damaged brains. AI questioned medical ethics. Health anxiety replaced tracking. Balance, not extremes, is the future.

title: New Labour codes: Draft rules out - how will salary, gratuity, allowances be calculated? Explained
content: New Labour Codes: The Ministry of labour has released the draft labour codes on December 31, 2025. The new rules and a set of FAQs clarify wage, gratuity, allowances calculation. We take a look:

title: NFL trade rumours: Joe Burrow to Jets as Bengals land Fernando Mendoza
content: A wild NFL trade rumor suggests the Bengals could acquire Heisman winner Fernando Mendoza, potentially using Joe Burrow to secure five first-round picks from the Jets. While fans dismiss the idea, Mendoza's potential as a top prospect and the Bengals' defensive needs are explored. Burrow's massive contract complicates any such hypothetical move.

title: Pralay missile test: India conducts successful salvo launch off Odisha coast - watch
content: India successfully conducted a salvo launch of two indigenously developed Pralay missiles off the coast of Odisha. The tests, conducted in quick succession from the same launcher, met all flight objectives, demonstrating the missile system's operational reliability and readiness for induction into the armed forces.

title: Stefon Diggs‚Äô viral proposal rehearsal sparks buzz amid Cardi B backlash
content: A viral video of Stefon Diggs appearing to propose to Cardi B on the field, later revealed as him fixing her gear, has reignited public interest in their relationship. This comes amid Cardi B addressing online criticism and Diggs facing felony assault charges, which he denies. The Patriots support him as the legal process unfolds.

title: 'Don‚Äôt let them decide'- Ex-England captain's message to Khawaja on Test retirement
content: Former India opener Aakash Chopra backs Delhi Capitals to win the 2026 Women's Premier League. He also tips Royal Challengers Bengaluru captain Smriti Mandhana to dominate the batting charts and win the Orange Cap. Delhi Capitals' Shafali Verma is also a strong contender for the top run-scorer award.

title: NFL futures: Seattle Seahawks enter Week 18 as Super Bowl favorites
content: Through 17 weeks of the NFL season, the  Seattle Seahawks  are the new favorites to win the Super Bowl 60, following the  Los Angeles Rams 's loss on "Monday Night Football." The Rams drop to second, as three NFC West teams sit in the top four. The AFC West-winning  Denver Broncos  have the third-best odds to win the Super Bowl at +700. The  San Francisco 49ers  at +850 and the AFC East champion  New England Patriots  at +900. The Seahawks and 49ers meet in Week 18. Note: Odds by  DraftKings Sportsbook  and subject to change.

title: Free agent pickups: Look to Saints, Titans amid Week 18 uncertainty
content: the 17th and penultimate Sunday of the season featured excellent performances by new England Patriots QB Drake Maye, Cincinnati Bengals RB Chase Brown and New Orleans Saints WR Chris Olave . the Patriots and Seattle Seahawks each won their 13th game; the Las Vegas Raiders lost their 14th game .

title: ACC preview: Final Four contenders, more March Madness predictions
content: the 18-team league received its lowest number of NCAA bids in more than a decade . it hasn't been a top-three conference since before 2020 . the ACC had eight top-40 teams in 2019 compared to last season's four .

title: Which NBA star had the best year? The 2025 Golden Basketball goes to ...
content: the Oklahoma City Thunder are 1-2 again in the first installment of the MVP straw poll conducted by ESPN's Tim Bontemps . Shai Gilgeous-Alexander and Nikola Jokic of the Denver Nuggets battled for MVP of the 2024-25 regular season .

title: Transfer rumors, news: Jo√£o Cancelo back on Barcelona's radar
content: former barcelona loanee is in the sights of the laLiga champions . the 31-year-old is set to leave the Saudi Pro League side during the transfer window following a fallout with manager Simone Inzaghi . cancelo could face competition from Juventus and Internazionale .

title: NBA Power Rankings: Where all 30 teams stack up
content: the New York Knicks are sporting the no. 3 best offense in the league in December . but keep an eye on the race for the play-in as we approach the back half of the regular season . it's a close race at the top of the East with the Detroit Pistons holding strong at No. 1 .

title: After emphatic win over title rivals, Arsenal can dare to dream once more
content: Steve Nicol makes arsenal premier league title favorites after emphatic win over Aston Villa . the win was more than just a 4-1 victory . it answers a valid question of their journey to this point: could they actually beat one of their rivals for the title?

title: How speedster Zachariah Branch made a fast impression at Georgia
